Title: Operational
Description: The active network infrastructure for the span is live and carrying traffic.

Title: Under construction
Description: Construction of the passive physical infrastructure for the span is in progress.

Title: Planned
Description: Planning for the span is at an advanced stage and financing for its construction is finalised.

Title: Decommissioned
Description: The span is no longer operational.

Title: Proposed
Description: Planning for the span is at an early stage and financing for its construction is not yet finalised.

Title: Inactive
Description: Construction of the passive network infrastructure is complete, but the span is not yet operational.
